Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Okay let me try to work through this problem step by step So the user provided a loan application process with strict normative rules and some desiderata recommended but not strict They also gave an event log with three cases and want me to analyze which cases violate the rules and which ones dont meet the desiderata

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: First I need to understand the normative constraints thoroughly The strict sequence is Application Received Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Inform Applicant If Approved Finalize Documentation Close Case The ordering rules are that Credit Check must come before Risk Assessment which must come before Loan Decision Then Inform Applicant after Loan Decision If approved Finalize Documentation before Close Case if rejected close without finalizing

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Now looking at the event log for each case Case 1 The activities follow the correct sequence Application is received then Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Approved Inform Applicant Finalize Documentation Close Case All steps are in order and since its approved Finalize is done before closing No issues here So Case 1 is compliant with normative rules

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 2 Application Received then immediately Risk Assessment Wait thats a problem because Credit Check must happen before Risk Assessment So here Risk Assessment is done before Credit Check That violates the ordering rule Then after Risk Assessment Credit Check is done which is out of order Then Loan Decision Rejected which is okay But then Finalize Documentation is done after a rejection Thats another violation because if rejected you shouldnt finalize documentation So Case 2 has two normative violations incorrect order of Credit Check and Risk Assessment and finalizing documentation after rejection

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 3 Application is received then 24 hours later Credit Check is done Wait the desideratum says Credit Check should be within 24 hours So if the application was on 20240112 0900 and Credit Check is on 20240114 1000 thats 42 hours later Thats a desideratum violation Then Risk Assessment Loan Decision Approved then Inform Applicant is on 20240116 1500 The decision was made on 20240114 1200 so the inform is 2 days and 3 hours later The desideratum is to inform within 48 hours which is 2 days So thats also a desideratum violation Then Finalize and Close Case The sequence is correct here Also theres no Followup Call which is a desideratum but not a normative rule So Case 3 has three desideratum violations delayed Credit Check delayed Inform Applicant and missing Followup Call No normative violations

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: So for the first task identifying normative violations Cases 2 and 3 Wait no Wait Case 3 has no normative violations Only Case 2 has normative violations Case 3 has desideratum issues but follows the strict sequence

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Then for the desiderata Cases 3 and maybe some others Let me check again Case 1 All steps are done in time Credit Check is within 24 hours from 0900 to 0930 same day so 30 minutes Inform Applicant is done 2 hours after the decision which is within 48 hours Also theres no mention of a Followup Call but since its not required thats okay So Case 1 meets desiderata

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 2 The Credit Check is done after Risk Assessment which is a normative violation The desiderata for Case 2 The Credit Check is done 40 minutes after Application from 0800 to 0820 is 20 minutes then Risk Assessment is at 0820 then Credit Check at 0820 to 0820 Wait no Wait the timestamps for Case 2 are Application Received 20240111 0800 Risk Assessment 20240111 0820 Credit Check 20240111 0820 to 0900 wait the timestamps are 0820 for Risk Assessment then 0900 for Credit Check So the Credit Check is done after Risk Assessment So the Credit Check is 40 minutes after the Risk Assessment The desideratum for Credit Check is within 24 hours after application The application was at 0800 and Credit Check is at 0900 same day so 1 hour later Thats within 24 hours so no desideratum violation there However the Inform Applicant is after Loan Decision The Loan Decision is at 0930 then Inform Applicant at 1000 Thats 30 minutes later which is within 48 hours So the only desideratum issue here is that the Followup Call is missing But the desiderata mention that Followup Call is encouraged but not required So Case 2 doesnt have a desideratum violation in timing but maybe missing the followup But since the problem says to identify which cases fail to meet desiderata conditions and the desiderata include the timing and the followup So Case 2s desiderata the Credit Check is within 24 hours the Inform is within 48 but no followup However the problem says that failing to adhere to timing recommendations or skipping followup is a desideratum violation So Case 2 has one desideratum violation missing followup but since the users event log for Case 2 doesnt have a Followup Call thats a desideratum issue But the users task is to identify which cases fail to meet desiderata So Case 2 and Case 3 have desideratum issues Case 2s desideratum violations missing followup Case 3s delayed Credit Check delayed Inform and missing followup

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: So summarizing 1 Normative violations Only Case 2 ordering of Credit Check and Risk Assessment and Finalize after rejection 2 Desideratum violations Case 2 missing followup and Case 3 delayed Credit Check delayed Inform missing followup Case 1 has none

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Now for the third part suggesting interpretations or justifications For Case 2 the Credit Check was done after Risk Assessment Maybe there was a mistake in the process or the system allowed it The Finalize Documentation after rejection might be a data entry error For Case 3 the delays could be due to high workload or backlogs The missing followup could be an oversight or a decision to prioritize closing the case quickly

Name: Validation - PE
Text: I need to make sure I didnt miss any other violations Let me check again Case 2 The sequence is Application Risk Assessment incorrect Credit Check correct after Risk Assessment but out of order Loan Decision Rejected Finalize Documentation incorrect after rejection Close Case So two normative violations here The ordering of Credit Check and Risk Assessment and Finalize after rejection

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Case 3 All steps are in correct order Approved so Finalize before Close No normative issues But desiderata Credit Check done 42 hours after application application on 12th at 0900 Credit Check on 14th at 1000 12th to 14th is 2 days but 1000 is 1 day and 1 hour after 12th 0900 Wait 20240112 0900 to 20240114 1000 is 2 days and 1 hour So over 48 hours So thats a desideratum violation Then Inform Applicant is on 16th at 1500 The decision was on 14th 1200 From 14th 1200 to 16th 1500 is 2 days and 3 hours which is over 48 hours So thats another desideratum violation Also no followup call So three desideratum issues

Name: Validation - IND
Text: So the users answer should list these points
